1.name: Express
1.desc: Express treatment (if by rail, legal express regime for parcels transport).

2.name: High speed
2.desc: Transport under legal international rail convention (CIM) concluded between rail organizations and based on fast routing and specified timetables.

3.name: Normal speed
3.desc: Transport under legal international rail convention (CIM) concluded between rail organizations.

4.name: Post service
4.desc: Transport under conditions specified by UPU (Universal Postal Union) and Rail organizations (parcels transport only).
